content: the cozy to corner blanket is a cute and colorful blanket for your little one this beginner-friendly project is worked entirely in garter stitch with basic increases and decreases our gorgeous easy-care uptown dk multi does all the work with its color-shifting print **skill** knitting **difficulty** basic **sizes** one size **finished measurements** width 32½ length 32½ **materials** **universal yarn** *uptown dk multi* 1 100% anti-pilling acrylic 200g/529 yds 205 dusk 2 skeins see pattern notes needle us size 8 5 mm 24 circular or longer to accommodate large number of sts or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle removable stitch marker **gauge** 19 sts x 38 row = 4 in garter st after blocking save time check your gauge **pattern notes** this blanket is knit flat from corner to corner beginning with 3 stitches increases are worked to the widest edge and then stitches are decreased to the opposite point the sample shown weighs almost exactly 400g you will need to unravel your swatch to ensure you have enough yarn to complete the project 1 https //universalyarn com/collections/new/products/udkm
